thread.title: Christine Michael (Cowboys RB) Claims a Cop Pulled Him Over to Take a Photo With Him
thread.title_full: Christine Michael (Cowboys RB) Claims a Cop Pulled Him Over to Take a Photo With Him | Complex UK

author: Chris Yuscavage
title: Christine Michael (Cowboys RB) Claims a Cop Pulled Him Over to Take a Photo With Him
text:
Christine Michael has only been a member of the Cowboys for about a month now. He’s also currently third on the Dallas depth chart when it comes to the running back position. So he's not exactly the biggest star on the team. But according to him, that didn’t stop a Texas police officer from pulling him over yesterday morning simply to take a picture with him on the side of the road.
“Got stopped just to take a picture,” he wrote on Instagram.
Unfortunately, that’s all Michael has said at this point, but we’re guessing there’s going to be a much better back story for this photo. We’ll let you know what it is whenever Michael is asked about it this week.
Send all complaints, compliments, and tips to sportstips@complex.com .
[ via Shutdown Corner ]
